backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI/UX update tasks, related files, components, and test IDs for two major styling features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based design tokens for light/dark modes with global border and background rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that sets metadata and loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the full singleâ€‘page marketing site layout with header, all sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: About section describing the agency and rendering a grid of value cards inside a reusable section shell.
Marketing CTA section with email form submission and support/guarantee stats.
Hero section with marketing pitch, scroll actions, trust indicators, and visual stats cards.
Renders privacy policy content sections with headings, dates, and detailed legal text.
Displays a four-step marketing process using cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
Shows key business metrics with icons to highlight credibility and performance.
Reusable layout wrapper applying background variants and container styling for sections.
Lists service offerings with icons, descriptions, feature lists, and CTA to contact section.
Displays client testimonials with ratings, quotes, and avatar info.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Footer component with brand block, link groups, social icons, and attribution using Vercel-inspired neutral styling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Sticky responsive header with scroll-aware styling, navigation buttons, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a hook that creates a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks tied to backend methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styling, custom CSS variables, typography rules, and utility classes for the UI theme.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, color tokens, plugins, and design extensions for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, goals, requirements, known issues, and planned frontend/UI revamp features.
